attributes.additional_details: There are three good reasons why this man deserves a Knighthood 1>For all his work in the film industry - he has entertained millions of people and made them happy 2>He is a selfless bon viveur and raconteur 3>All his friend have Knighthoods and he looks the odd one out in photos with them. Lets not leave it any longer. Please sign this petition and yell your friends. Lets see if we can give Michael a New Year to remember!
